content.text: Match ends, KRC Genk 1, Bayer 04 Leverkusen 1.
Second Half ends, KRC Genk 1, Bayer 04 Leverkusen 1.
Offside, KRC Genk. Daniel Pudil tries a through ball, but Fabien Camus is caught offside.
Corner,  KRC Genk. Conceded by Bernd Leno.
Attempt saved. Thomas Buffel (KRC Genk) right footed shot from the left side of the box is saved in the top right corner. Assisted by Elianiv Barda.
Corner,  KRC Genk. Conceded by Gonzalo Castro.
Attempt saved. Fabien Camus (KRC Genk) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Thomas Buffel.
Jeroen Simaeys (KRC Genk) is shown the yellow card.
Corner,  Bayer 04 Leverkusen. Conceded by Nadson.
Attempt blocked. Eren Derdiyok (Bayer 04 Leverkusen) left footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Sidney Sam with a cross.
Attempt saved. Elianiv Barda (KRC Genk) right footed shot from the right side of the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Fabien Camus.
Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Substitution, Bayer 04 Leverkusen. Nicolai Jørgensen replaces Stefan Reinartz.
Delay in match Jeroen Simaeys (KRC Genk) because of an injury.
Eren Derdiyok (Bayer 04 Leverkusen) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Foul by Eren Derdiyok (Bayer 04 Leverkusen).
Jeroen Simaeys (KRC Genk) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Corner,  Bayer 04 Leverkusen. Conceded by László Köteles.
Attempt saved. Sidney Sam (Bayer 04 Leverkusen) left footed shot from the left side of the box is saved in the top centre of the goal.
Attempt saved. Stefan Kießling (Bayer 04 Leverkusen) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Sidney Sam.
Substitution, KRC Genk. Elianiv Barda replaces Jelle Vossen.
Hand ball by Sidney Sam (Bayer 04 Leverkusen).
Goal!  KRC Genk 1, Bayer 04 Leverkusen 1. Eren Derdiyok (Bayer 04 Leverkusen) right footed shot from the centre of the box to the bottom right corner. Assisted by Sidney Sam.
Simon Rolfes (Bayer 04 Leverkusen) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Anele Ngcongca (KRC Genk).
Substitution, KRC Genk. Thomas Buffel replaces Anthony Limbombe.
Offside, KRC Genk. Anthony Vanden Borre tries a through ball, but Fabien Camus is caught offside.
Substitution, Bayer 04 Leverkusen. Bastian Oczipka replaces Michal Kadlec.

Substitution, Bayer 04 Leverkusen. Stefan Kießling replaces André Schürrle.
Attempt missed. Eren Derdiyok (Bayer 04 Leverkusen) right footed shot from very close range is close, but misses to the left. Assisted by Gonzalo Castro with a cross.

Corner,  Bayer 04 Leverkusen. Conceded by Anthony Vanden Borre.

Eren Derdiyok (Bayer 04 Leverkusen) hits the bar with a right footed shot from the centre of the box.
Attempt saved. André Schürrle (Bayer 04 Leverkusen) right footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Simon Rolfes with a through ball.

Corner,  Bayer 04 Leverkusen. Conceded by Anthony Vanden Borre.
Corner,  KRC Genk. Conceded by Stefan Reinartz.
